data.title: bd-3is: Adopt terseid for ID generation
data.description: Replace UUID-based ID generation with terseid library. Uses IdGenerator with prefixes cr (reviews), th (threads), c (comments). Validators now use parse_id for flexible-length ID recognition.

data.reason: Security review passed. The change uses cryptographically secure randomness (getrandom) with SHA256 hashing. The reduced ID space (4 base36 chars vs UUID) is a deliberate usability tradeoff, not a security concern - IDs are opaque identifiers, not auth tokens. No injection vectors, no secrets, no auth bypass paths.
